pages.title: Mermaid's Brushes
pages.text: An inconspicuous plant grows in the deepest depths of the oceans, forever untouched by human influence.$(br)They grow a single blossom, which slowly develops into a pearl-shaped seed.$()$(br2)Mermaid's Brushes can be harvested using shears.

pages.title: Mermaid's Gems
pages.text: Fully grown, these hollow seeds float to the surface to be carried away by the soft waves.$(br2)Mermaid's Gems have a strong bond with water - obviously.
